content.question: In which of the following ways does the passageâ€™s style relate to its content?

choices.label: A simile makes the challenges faced on the journey more vivid.
The enjambment of certain words draws attention to a key challenge faced on the journey.
Interlocking word order highlights an unexpected challenge faced on the journey.
Parallel structure establishes a relationship among various challenges faced on the journey.

content.answer: Parallel structure establishes a relationship among various challenges faced on the journey.

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 2.A: Describe features and functions of stylistic elements in Latin texts.
